name: MonoPhobia (itch) (T A)
description:
This is a Prototype of a Game that im working on and Hopefully you guys will like it :D Its a simple yet Beautiful looking game made with a few assets and some unprofessional coding

The concept is about exploring a vast open world Ocean Like world thats yet to be found by humans, Explore and Find out the secrets of this new world as You progess through Simple and relaxing Environment
